Insight: Longer passwords are exponentially more secure

Supporting_Evidence: Adding symbols increased scores by 20-30 points on average
All dictionary-based passwords scored weak or very weak
Passwords with personal info had higher risk ratings
Symbol inclusion raised crack time from minutes to years

Insight: Password length is more important than complexity
Supporting_Evidence: Long passphrase without symbols outperformed short complex ones
Random 25-character password achieved maximum security rating
